'''Murayama''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in {{Quest|Ere the End, a Glance Back}}.

==Profile==
Murayama was part of a group of [[Nobushi|ronin]] who took over the [[Hidden Mountain Base]] of the [[Takatsukasa Clan]], who abandoned their stronghold after their plot to take control of the [[Tenryou Commission]] from the [[Kujou Clan]] was exposed.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Through the Mist, a Name Unveiled}}</ref> During the events of [[Ere the End, a Glance Back]], Murayama and the other ronin are defeated by [[Kaedehara Kazuha]] in their [[Occupied Hold]] as a means for Kazuha to test the [[Prized Isshin Blade (Awakened)|Prized Isshin Blade]].

===Appearance===
Murayama is presumably the [[Kairagi: Dancing Thunder]] who appears near the end of the [[Occupied Hold]]. However, there is nothing explicitly identifying him as such.
